author: liver
glottocode: ɛs, esyɛ-(l) 'liver, his liver' - see Bender et al. (2003)

author: to know, be knowledgeable
glottocode: orthographic form; etʌ in Bender et al. (2003)

author: to fear
glottocode: feel unwelcome, ill at ease, awkward

author: to drink
glottocode: reflex of PMic *nima 'drinkable object, with possessive classifier'

author: bird
glottocode: is this 1 really?  RG. No, I think KSR mæn is the cognate. See Bender et al. (2003)

author: fish
glottocode: a kind of fish ( probable loan from Mrs)

author: rotten
glottocode: rotten, mellow, pimple, flake of skin

author: lightning
glottocode: Bender et al. (2003:327) suggest this is a loan from Marshallese
